articles.author: Sophie Collins
articles.title: How long will warm spell last as Met Éireann give latest update on incoming decline - Irish Mirror
articles.description: Indications are that the high pressure over Europe will decline
articles.content:
Irelands stint of summer weather looks likely to continue into next week as a high-pressure system dominates over Europe.
To put a dampener on hopes of a lengthy bout of sunshine, Met Eireann has co… [+2084 chars]

articles.author: Eoin Reynolds
articles.title: Murderer Graham Dwyer gets High Court blow in bid for freedom over phone records - Sunday World
articles.description: The ruling of the Court of Justice of the European Union (CJEU) in Graham Dwyer's case that the indiscriminate retention of mobile phone data for use in criminal investigations is a breach of law, does not automatically mean that such evidence should be exclu…
